result.title: Chrome extension for coding (Challenge Hunt)
result.content:
Hi all!

Challenge Hunt is a side project that I and Chirrag Nangia built a couple of months back. It shows you all the active and upcoming challenges various platforms including CodeForces, TopCoder, HackerRank, Kaggle and the likes. The idea of Challenge Hunt came to us when we had to go on check 3-4 websites every time we sat down to solve some competitve programming problem.

Challenge Hunt which has the following features:

  • It shows you active and upcoming challenges from over 25 platforms including CodeForces, TopCoder, HackerRank, CodeChef, HackerEarth, Google Code Jam, Facebook HackerCup and the likes.
  • You can set your list of preferred websites for challenges.
  • Set reminders on upcoming challenges.

The code for the app is open source. If you like it, don't forget to star it: https://github.com/ChallengeHunt/challengehunt

You can install the extension from here: http://bitly.com/1E3T9sQ

We would you love your feedback on it!

PS: If you wish to contribute to Challenge Hunt, feel free to contact us!
